wikiDescription: Use /spawn to instantly teleport to the server's spawn area. Great for regrouping with friends or escaping dangerous situations quickly.
Mark your base or safe zone with /sethome. Return anytime using /home. Exclusive to players with linked Discord accounts.
Send teleport requests with /tpa. Accept requests with /tpaccept to travel to other players. Perfect for teaming up or visiting friends.
Send private messages to players using /msg. Only you and the recipient see the conversation. Ensures secure communication.
Use /back to teleport to your last location after teleporting or dying (if permitted). Ideal for retracing your steps.
Transfer money to another player with /pay. Supports trading or helping friends. Part of the server's economy system.
Connect your Minecraft and Discord accounts via /discord link. Use the code from the #link channel on Discord. Unlocks synced roles and chat integration.

AuraSkills offers a rich RPG skill system for Minecraft servers. - Skills: Level up 11 default skills like Mining, Combat, Farming, Woodcutting, Fishing, Enchanting, and more. - XP Gain: Earn skill XP by performing actions like breaking blocks, fighting mobs, or harvesting crops. - XP Sources: View XP sources for each skill using the XP bottle in the skill road GUI. - Level Rewards: Every level boosts stats (e.g., health, damage, luck) and unlocks up to 5 passive abilities at levels 1, 5, 10, 15, and 20. - Abilities: Passive abilities enhance gameplay, such as increased drop rates or faster resource gathering. - Skill Points: Earn points to unlock or upgrade abilities in customizable skill trees. - Commands: Use /skills to open the interactive GUI for progress, stats, and ability management. - Use /skill to view detailed info on a skillâ€™s abilities, XP requirements, and upgrades.

Hunt the Rogue Wanderer, a unique NPC. Defeat it three times to earn a Beam Stone. Receive a new hint after each defeat, updated daily at 15:00. Check Discord for notifications. Additional hints guide you as you get closer.
